General.Name: Assetco Plc
General.Description: AssetCo plc engages in acquiring, managing, and operating asset and wealth management activities and interests. It also offers investment management and advisory services, as well as is involved in the marketing of thematic exchange traded funds. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 30 Coleman Street, London, United Kingdom, EC2R 5AL
